raw_comment:
I do not Like this graph as it is confusing and hard to understand

I notice there is a line but I am not sure what it’s supposed to represent. 
I wonder why only two countries are under the line. 
It relates to us because vaccines are currently a very hot topic. 

“Vaccine approval declines with age”
ace_sentences: I do not like this graph.
This graph is hard to understand.
I notice a line in this graph.
I am not sure what this line represents.
Only two countries are under this line.
I wonder why only two countries are under this line.
Vaccines are currently a hot topic.
The headline is: Vaccine approval declines with age.
